column5: Ideal for family transitioning to / seeking short term stay in North Texas (Frisco) Fully furnished 4 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, golf course home Play room, media room, family room, reading room Backyard playset and community pool access Cable TV, Wi-Fi, Utilities provided Easy access to Dallas North Tollway, 121 Tollway, DFW Airport and LUV Field 5-minute commute to a large variety of shopping, restaurants, recreational activities Pets welcome with non-refundable deposit (fenced yard)
column8: Frisco fully furnished, shaded, golf course home
